    • Constructor Detail

      • GameBoard

        public GameBoard​(int skulls,
                 ModelFactory factory)
        Constructor that allows to specify the number of skulls
        Parameters:
        skulls - number of skulls to be placed on the gameboard
        factory - the factory of the model

    • Method Detail

      • refillAmmoTile

        public void refillAmmoTile()
        Goes through all the StandardSquares and if the ammoTile is missing, adds one.

      • refillSpawnPoints

        public void refillSpawnPoints()
        Goes through all the SpawnPoints and if it's not full of weapon, adds until full.

      • addKill

        public void addKill​(java.util.List<PlayerToken> tokens)
        Add a kill to the killShotTrack, this method also decreases the number of skulls left. According to the rules, if there are no skulls left, all the kills are appended to the last kill scored.
        Parameters:
        tokens - The tokens of the player who scored the kill.

      • getRemainingSkulls

        public int getRemainingSkulls()
        Return the amount of remaining skulls.
        Returns:
        The amount of remaining skulls.

        Returns:
        The kill shot track.

      • countKills

        public int countKills​(PlayerToken playerColor)
        Tells you how many kills a player has scored
        Parameters:
        playerColor - The player identifier
        Returns:
        the number of kills scored by the specified player

      • getKillShotTrackOrder

        public java.util.List<PlayerToken> getKillShotTrackOrder()
        Returns:
        The list of PlayerTokens that got a kill this game, in descending order. If two players have the same number of kills, then the faster kill decides the order.
